<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/prompts/{prompt_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update prompt.

Update an existing prompt (increments version).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"prompt_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Path parameter: prompt_id"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"prompt":{"type":"string","title":"Prompt"},"version":{"type":"integer","title":"Version"},"variables":{"anyOf":[{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},{"type":"null"}]},"set_as_default":{"type":"boolean","title":"Set As Default","default":true}},"type":"object","required":["prompt","version"],"title":"UpdatePromptRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
